summary: This mod makes Nazeem somewhat useful
descriptionHtml:
[u]Dovahzeem by DatGuyWithAwesomeHair[/u]

[u]Description:[/u]
This mod is a replacer for the regular Nazeem to make him somewhat useful. He is usually critising the people at the Market area in Whiterun or asks you if you often visit the Cloud District! Now guess what! Nazeem will actually join on your adventures! He is now Dragonborn and can use most of the shouts too! He wears custom named armor and weapons! And the best part is I didn't make him essential which means if he ever angers you, he can be taken care of and then respawn back in Whiterun.

[u]How to use:[/u]

Approach Nazeem and tell him to follow you!

[u]Requirements:[/u]

DawnguardDragonborn Hearthfire

[u]Compatibility:[/u] Should be compatible with every mod on the Nexus except mods that Modify the Vanilla Nazeem!

[u]Credits:
[/u]
Bethesda

[u]Installation:[/u]

Use NMM or simply extract this archive to your Skyrim Data Folder!
[u]
Uninstallion:[/u] Use NMM or delete the esp in your data folder!

[u]FAQ:[/u]

Q:How do I change his clothes?!
A:Use AFT or UFO

Q: How can I have fun with him as a follower?
A: Open the console, Click on him and type in the following: equipitem 000f9670 1

Q: Any Armor suggestions?
A: For extra fun download Troll Face Mask and Troll Face Shield (Falkreath Guard Shield Replacer)
author: DatGuyWithAwesomeHair
